full_summary:
*Business Analyst – Senior*
========================================================

Government Tender Announcement
----------------------------

### Contract Reference Number
W6952-24-004

### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-09 14:00:00

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
285 Coventry, Ottawa, ON K1K 3X6, Canada

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Description of the Requirement
The Department of National Defence/Digital Transformation Office (DTO) requires a revised Analytics Support Center (ASC) Services Inventory. The updated inventory should be ambitious regarding future analytics-based services while respecting Level 1 (L1) and their resourcing within DND. The contractor will:

* Conduct interviews with each L1 to create a new and updated list of services to better suit L1 needs and resourcing constraints.
* Gauge the appetite for additional analytics governance through specific questions, including an assessment of ASCs’ role within and relationship to the DND/CAF Data Governance Framework (DGF).
* Provide a revised Service Inventory for L1 assessment and feedback, as well as recommendations on integrating ASCs into the DND/CAF Data Stewardship Model.

### Estimated Level of Effort
135 days

### Incumbent
NavPoint Consulting Group Inc.

### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Language Requirements
English and French

### Contact Information
Nancy Pelchat (nancy.pelchat@forces.gc.ca, 613-281-0419)

### Proposer Eligibility
This requirement is open to qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified for the Tier 1 level for the Business Consulting / Change Management stream.

### Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply
This contract is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Companies interested in finding out how to become Qualified SA Holders should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA. JSName
